# Alex Erlandsson - Front-end Developer

> Personal portfolio website for Alexander Erlandsson, a front-end developer based in Gothenburg, Sweden

## About

Alex Erlandsson is a front-end developer passionate about building scalable and accessible design systems. He specializes in CSS and enjoys pushing the boundaries of what is possible to build with CSS.

With experience working on large projects at scale, Alex bridges the gap between design and development â€” creating interfaces that look great, feel intuitive, and work for everyone.

## Site Features

- Interactive 3D CSS avatar with mouse/keyboard rotation controls
- Pure CSS 3D graphics demonstration
- Responsive design with dark/light mode support
- Accessible implementation with ARIA labels and semantic HTML

## Key Content

- **Homepage**: https://alexerlandsson.com/
  - Features interactive 3D CSS character
  - About section with professional background
  - Social media links

## Technical Highlights

- Built with semantic HTML5
- Advanced CSS 3D transformations and animations
- Accessibility-focused implementation
- Mobile-responsive design
- Theme-aware color schemes (light/dark mode)
